parameters.query: SELECT mc.*, mc.brand_config, mc.voice_config, mc.mj_asset_library, mc.template_preset, mc.template_config, mc.target_locales FROM media_channels mc WHERE mc.channel_id = $1 AND mc.is_active = TRUE
SELECT * FROM mj_asset_library WHERE channel_id = $1 AND is_active = TRUE ORDER BY asset_type, asset_category, usage_count DESC
SELECT * FROM bgm_library WHERE is_active = TRUE AND (genre = $1 OR genre = 'universal') ORDER BY usage_count DESC LIMIT 20
SELECT * FROM elevenlabs_voices WHERE is_active = TRUE AND $1 = ANY(supported_languages) ORDER BY total_characters_generated DESC LIMIT 5
